title: Iterative and Organic Pedagogical Approaches for Academic Library Education Module Design and Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information retrieval skills and experience in utilizing academic resources
context.additional_context: A tailored program for pre-service/in-service teachers, developing competencies in designing library education modules to strengthen language expertise.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design academic information search strategies
Learners can iteratively improve online learning modules through repeated feedback
Learners can integrate and apply library instruction modules into language curricula
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
